** 7 《述而篇第七》

7.2子曰：¶

7.6子曰：¶
「志於道，¶

依於仁，¶
遊於藝。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_007-7a>¶

7.10子於是日哭，¶
則不歌。

好謀而成者也。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_007-14a>¶	KR1a0038_002:27b:6:8:60,KR1a0074_004:8a:5:5:37,KR1b0007_015:14b:1:9:1,KR1b0016_008:22a:4:17:0,KR1c0040_006:6a:6:10:2,KR1c0041_018:97a:6:23:89,KR1d0057_140:7b:8:16:0,KR1d0058_032:25a:4:24:2,KR1d0058_032:56a:4:24:5,KR1d0059_009:44a:3:10:10,KR1d0060_026:34a:6:2:3,KR1d0071_023:46b:3:19:13,KR1e0050_008:13a:1:12:1,KR1e0054_009:12b:2:2:1,KR1e0071_013:22b:1:1:3,KR1e0074_012:29b:7:15:32,KR1e0091_001:80a:2:3:6,KR1g0009_004:4a:3:14:2,KR1h0004_007:11a:13:1:11,KR1h0005_004:3b:1:1:0,KR1h0006_004:5b:3:4:12,KR1h0007_007:5b:1:14:14,KR1h0007_007:5b:7:36:14,KR1h0012_004:8a:3:10:20,KR1h0012_004:9a:1:7:21,KR1h0015_004:3b:1:16:4,KR1h0017_007:16b:9:11:62,KR1h0020_002:10a:9:10:50,KR1h0021_000:80a:1:11:351,KR1h0024_009:6a:4:8:4,KR1h0026_004:5b:11:10:20,KR1h0028_007:10b:9:1:35,KR1h0034_007:10b:6:1:35,KR1h0034_007:11a:8:9:36,KR1h0038_008:7a:6:1:35,KR1h0039_004:6a:4:8:21,KR1h0039_006:1b:10:5:7,KR1h0039_006:41b:1:16:88,KR1h0043_007:18b:6:1:34,KR1h0043_007:19a:3:28:35,KR2d0005_032:15a:5:6:1,KR2f0039_232:28a:2:16:2,KR2k0040_116:22a:5:12:327,KR2k0046_113:37b:1:19:16,KR2o0020_077:77b:8:15:178,KR2o0022_016:10b:8:22:71,KR3a0047_034:35b:2:17:12,KR3a0059_029:26b:7:11:2,KR3a0078_061:26a:7:19:20,KR3a0080_132:20b:2:13:142,KR3a0080_141:14a:1:11:34,KR3a0080_146:15a:1:2:87,KR3a0108_015:18b:1:17:22,KR3j0021_002:15b:5:6:14,KR3k0025_053:44b:4:15:15,KR3k0030_181:1a:8:9:2,KR3k0045_010:11a:8:20:3,KR4d0284_017:4a:2:16:4,KR4d0351_001:32a:5:4:10,KR4e0005_015:17a:3:5:11,KR4e0006_006:42b:1:16:35,KR4e0070_067:2b:2:19:5,KR4e0114_022:3a:1:12:3

7.12子曰：¶

7.13子之所慎：¶
齋、戰、疾。

又何怨？」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_007-19a>¶
出，¶
曰：¶

7.17子曰：¶

<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_007-23a>¶

子曰：¶

7.21子不語：¶怪、力、亂、神。

# src: LY 07.26:01; tr. CH
<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_007-30a>¶
7.26子曰：¶
「聖人，¶

# src: LY 07.29; tr. CH
7.29互鄉難與言，¶
童子見，¶
門人惑。¶
子曰：¶

7.31陳司敗問
